import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { logoutAction } from "../../../container/actions"; import Logout from "../../imports/Logout"; const UpdateUser = (props) => { const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const route = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem("x-access-token"); return token ? true : false; }; useEffect(() => { if (!route()) { history.push("/login"); } }, [route, history]); const logout = () => { dispatch(logoutAction()); }; const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [jabatan, setJabatan] = useState(""); const onChangeFile = (e) => { setFileName(e.target.files[0]); }; const changeOnClick = (e) => { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("username", username); formData.append("jabatan", jabatan); axios .put( `http://localhost:4000/api/teams/update/${props.match.params.id}`, formData ) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; useEffect(() => { axios .get(`http://localhost:4000/api/teams/${props.match.params.id}`) .then((res) => [ setUsername(res.data.username), setJabatan(res.data.jabatan), ]) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []); return (

); }; export default UpdateUser;
